titles.title: Congratulating the North Shore Senior High School football team of Houston, Texas, on their Class 5A Division I Texas State championship.
Congratulating the North Shore Senior High School football team of Houston, Texas, on their Class 5A Division I Texas State championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

bill.summary: Honors and congratulates Galena Park Independent School District's North Shore Senior High School football team in Houston, Texas, for their successful season and for their outstanding and memorable victory in the Class 5A Division I Texas State championship on December 13, 2003.
